name: Seneca - Minimal Portfolio and Blog OnePage UI Kit - Free Demo
description:
ðŸ‘‰ Get the full version from here.


Seneca is a template organised as a UI Kit that facilitates designing one-page and landing page websites. It contains 19+ components designed both for light and dark themes. Also, it comes with 3 pages interconnected as prototypes for Desktop, Tablet, and Smartphone. Each page is designed both for light and dark themes.


For a better design experience, there is a Style Guide page that contains global styles for Colors, Typography, Grids, Iconography, and Buttons. The entire design embraces the newest features provided by Figma as Auto Layout, Variants, Interactive Components, and many more.


ðŸš€ Core Features:

  • Auto Layout 3.0
  • Smart Variants
  • Light & Dark Mode
  • Global Styles
  • 165+ Icons
  • 19+ Components
  • 14+ Sections
  • 3+ Pages
